alert.note: Alert for Benson; Cavalier; Eddy; Ramsey; Towner (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued February 01 at 3:18AM CST until February 01 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch possible. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph this morning. * WHERE...Towner, Cavalier, Benson, Ramsey and Eddy Counties. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, mainly in open country. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
